description: S3 PutObject blocked (AccessDenied) on bucket northstar-dev-boy for user northstar-dev; keep provider, fix IAM later
Switch RequestContext to mode (saas|enterprise|lab), remove X-Env, reject legacy env; require tenant/project/mode headers on HTTP/SSE/WS
Add mode/project/app/surface/run/step/schema_version/severity/storage_class to DatasetEvent/StreamEvent and emitters; no-op loggers forbidden

area: Remove in-memory/noop defaults (repos/bus/logger); fail-fast startup when durable missing
Add PII pre-call redaction for LLM/tool/embedding + rehydration hook
Implement durable stream timeline; SSE/WS resume from storage, not memory/Redis (PR #6)
Add audit append-only with hash chaining/storage_class=audit
Make memory and nexus memory durable, tenant+mode+project scoped; no in-memory dict/backends (PR #4 / commit f2f17f4)
Add run/step/model/tool/storage_class=cost to usage events; durable repo plus cost kill-switch + /ops/status + Azure env stubs (PR #5)
Align vector explorer: mode headers, full envelope, durable logger, PII pre-call, no noop; vector-ish knowledge ingest + retrieval (PR #7 / commit 78b629e)
context Agents propagate mode/tenant/project headers, stable run/trace, no in-memory state

description: UI sends mode/tenant/project headers on HTTP/SSE/WS; Authorization required; no ?token
Connector calls carry tenant/mode/project; no noop backends
